title: Chipstars
author: Chipstars
content: Experience the thrill of the Rugby World Cup 2023 and elevate your betting game. Dive into this electrifying sportsbook tournament and stand a chance to clinch your share of a generous €1000 prize pool. Every bet you place on this monumental rugby event could pave your way to the top!Tournament Timeline:From the kick-off on 11th September to the final whistle on 28th October 2023, be a part of this exhilarating ride.How to Jump In:Select and place a bet on any match or event related to the Rugby World Cup 2023.Ensure your bets are exclusive to the Rugby World Cup 2023 matches to be eligible.With each wager, earn points to ascend the tournament ladder (detailed point system provided below).Keep an eagle eye on your ranking by visiting our leaderboard: In the Sportsbook section, navigate to Sport Tournament and then click on Bet Race.Point Accumulation Mechanics:Every 1 EUR you bet fetches you 1 point. It's that straightforward!Start making a mark by amassing a minimum of 20 points.Only bets valued at 1 EUR or more, with odds of 1.3 and above, will be considered.Only bets valued at 1 EUR or more, with odds of 1.3 and above, will be considered.Leaderboard Glory Awaits:1st Place: €3502nd Place: €2503rd Place: €1004th-8th Place: €509th Place: €3010th Place: €20Participate in hereYour passion for rugby combined with strategic bets could be your gateway to victory. Immerse yourself in this intense atmosphere take a look at the Rugby World Cup 2023 fixtures and race to the top, only on Chipstars. Ready, set, bet! BTCGeneral Bonus Terms & Conditions apply.
